article.class: post-330 page type-page status-publish hentry no-post-thumbnail

div.h3:
Welcome to the Corning School District’s website!
We hope you find it both informative and user friendly.
div.p: As Superintendent, I want to personally thank you for trusting us with your most precious possession…..your child. We do not take this trust lightly and we will do our very best to prepare your child to be college and career ready. I hope you will take an active role in your child’s education. I know if we work together, your child will be successful and receive a quality education.

If your child does not currently attend Corning School District, I would like to take this opportunity to extend an invitation to enroll your child in a very exciting and innovative school district. Please call my office and I will be glad to answer any questions you may have about our remarkable school. If you are presently considering Corning School District, you may request a school choice form from the Central Office or the Principal’s Office at any one of our three campuses (Park Elementary K-2, Corning Middle School 3-6, or Corning High School 7-12).

Park Elementary School is a nurturing learning environment committed to educating and inspiring all students to reach their full potential. We strive to be a strong foundation for our students’
educational pathway.

Corning Middle School is dedicated to offering students a rigorous and diverse curriculum using project based learning and technology as a foundation for achievement. Here, our goal is to prepare students to be abstract thinkers and problem solvers prepared to meet the challenges of high school and become successful citizens.

Corning High School is committed to preparing our students to be productive and contributing members of our community. Our goal is to provide our students with the communication, technological, and problem solving skills they need to complete tasks in an ever-changing world.
Check our Calendar for all athletic game dates.

The Corning School District provides a rigorous, collaborative, and diverse curriculum for each student that includes programs in all subject areas as well technology and foreign language. Graduating seniors have the opportunity to earn over thirty credit hours toward college as well gain experience with online coursework.
Our teachers live by the saying: “Teachers who love teaching… teach children to love learning.”
Check our Calendar for all athletic game dates.

The Corning School District provides a rigorous, collaborative, and diverse curriculum for each student that includes programs in all subject areas as well technology and foreign language. Graduating seniors have the opportunity to earn over thirty credit hours toward college as well gain experience with online coursework.
Our teachers live by the saying: “Teachers who love teaching… teach children to love learning.”
Stay up-to-date with district wide activites by subscribing to our google calendar.
